text:
3rd Squadron, 17th Cavalry Regiment with the 3rd Combat Aviation Brigade begins receiving and training on the the Army's newest helicopter, the AH-64E.

https://www.dvidshub.net/video/791361/3rd-combat-aviation-brigade-receives-new-ah-64e-apache-helicopter

This video highlights the first class offered on Hunter Army Airfield, the first retrofitted Apache flight simulator in the Army and some of the aircraft being received at 3-17th.
